msbt.message: Oh, where to begin I'd hire someone to help with all this, but I'm the only person I trust.
I'm terribly sorry for you to see my place in such a state.You'll have to come back when I can properly host you. I don't even have hors d'oeuvres to offer
Once I've got all this sorted out, my big move will finally be complete. C'mon, Focus!
I'll be at this all day, I'm afraid Time to buckle down and finish the job, !
It's like I haven't even made a dent! I should take a break, maybe a nice hot bath No! I WILL finish today!
, there's still so much to dobut I WILL finish everything by tomorrow, one way or another!
Now, should I replace all of my old furniture, or just 90 percent?What's the point of a fresh start if you're just going to stick with your stale things? That's what I say!
Let's see This can go here, and that can go over thereOr should it be exactly the opposite? Oh dear. This may take a while.
I'm not sure about this new rug Things can look so different when you actually bring them home!
There's SO much to do when one relocates, but at least the decorating is fun.
